title: Synergistic effect of nano-iron phosphide and wood vinegar on soybean production and grain quality
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00383G, Paper
Guikai Zhu, Yuying Tang, Yanru Ding, Weichen Zhao, Quanlong Wang, Yuanbo Li, Qibin Wang, Peng Zhang, Zhiqiang Tan, Yukui Rui
Phosphorus fertilizer (PF) is an important nutrient for crop growth, but it can be easily immobilized in the soil by oxides of aluminum, iron, and calcium, resulting in its reduced bioavailability.
